column5: Where the Scugog River runs into Sturgeon Lake is now open water, there were sleds crossing there two days ago. Be careful, conditions are changing fast!
I don't recommend driving a truck on there.....
wow I was running  right there Saturday night, thanks cliff
Wow......maybe they took a log out of the locks? Must be quite a bit of run-off during the daytime.  Thanks for the heads up, maybe I"ll take the boat for a rip  Sinker
My dad was out to his place on Nipissing today. There was a 1ft open hole in front of his dock. The heat coming off the logs is beginning to radiate. Your caution is well advised Cliff.
